about:
Creative, experienced and detail-oriented Software Developer with a strong focus on Front-End development. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, as well as SQL, C#, and ASP.NET on the back end. Known for creating visually compelling and responsive user interfaces, and committed to continuous learning, especially in an era where AI plays an increasingly central role in development.


Eager to solve complex challenges, work collaboratively, and contribute to impactful projects. Passionate about helping both teams and individuals reach their full potential through code, design, and thoughtful problem solving.
